channel.title: How do I make an npc drop more than one item?
channel.description:
My source is weird, and to make my npc drop something i have to put it in npchandler.java instead of npcdrop.cfg
So heres my code.
[code] } if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3340) { ItemHandler.addItem(1048, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 10000000, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);[/code]
How would I make it drop more than 1 white p hat(1048) or make it drop 2 different items?

item.title: How do I make an npc drop more than one item?
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

czar base, PM me if you want an tut of adding Devo drops onto Czars

item.title: How do I make an npc drop more than one item?
item.dc:creator: @crowd1 crowd1
item.description:
@crowd1 wrote:

this is for a 562 if it can help you out from npc XML

1 item drop npc

0 0 0 0

2 item drop npc

0 0 0 0 0 0

npc drop from CFG

#npcid=#itemid1,#minamount to drop, #max amount to drop, chance to drop: out of what chance;#itemid, $min amount. â€¦ ect
8133=13750,1-1,3:100;13752,1-1,3:100;

Read full topic
